Parent Engagement - Sunmarke School | British Curriculum | International School in Dubai Parent Engagement For Parents > Parent Engagement Parent Engagement Making Parents An Integral Part Of Their Child's Educational Journey In tune with the traditions adopted by the Fortes Education Group, Sunmarke emphasises a strong Parent Engagement Programme with parents being as involved in our community and aspects of school life as their children. Parents participate in their child’s education by attending assemblies, Parent’s Evenings, helping out with reading clubs and joining our popular monthly Wellness Wednesdays sessions for useful parenting and lifestyle advice by experts. The Parents Association – FOSS The Friends of Sunmarke School (FOSS) plays a central role, organising various community events throughout the year. Some calendar favourites include the Movie Night, World Culture Day, Cup Cake Sales, Mother’s Day, and Dance-A-Thon to name just a few. The Association also provides vital support to parents and families joining the school or those who have just moved to Dubai. The FOSS coffee mornings and the FOSS ‘Healthy Hub’ are great ways to make new friends and socialise. If you would like to know more about the activities and events organised by FOSS or would like to join this parent body, please please contact admin@forteseducation.com FOSS Core Team 2025-2026 Name Designation Email ID Bonita Peens Core Committee Member bpeens1@gmail.com Catalina Guaqueta Core Committee Member cat8282@hotmail.com Nicola Sutherland Core Committee Member nixitrix.ns@gmail.com Farah Shirani Core Committee Member farahshirani@gmail.com Katharine El Charif Core Committee Member Katharine_mcmahon@hotmail.com Wellness Wednesday Held once a month, Wellness Wednesday sessions allow parents to listen to a variety of specialist speakers and experts on important topics, be it the most recent research in child development or the best practices in Positive Education. Check out our video recordings to learn how to manage stress and anxiety, build resilience, practice cyber safety, and more! Click here to view our “Wellness Wednesday” events.

Governance Committee - Sunmarke School | British Curriculum | International School in Dubai Governance Committee For Parents > Governance Committee Governance Committee – SUNMAC The Individuals Who Enrich The School With Their Guidance The KHDA inspection team has recognised the Governing Body at Sunmarke School as being generously staffed in an outstanding building to enable students to receive high-quality education. Our Governance Committee comprises the Board of Directors (BOD) and an Advisory Council. The Board includes the owners and the Board of Directors who actively provide strategic direction to the school. The Advisory Council called “SUNMAC” comprises all stakeholders including parents, teachers and senior leaders This body meets three or four times a year and provides regular inputs. The Council also supports continuous improvement, and guides the development of the school, holding the leadership accountable for the quality of education delivered. Sub-committees have also been created to enable parents and leaders to evaluate key aspects of delivery in more detail with focus on Inclusion, Child Protection, Safeguarding, Health & Safety, Learning and Teaching, Attainment and Progress, Leadership and Professional Development. ECAs are run individually and in groups in sports, music, coding, and other subjects during the school year after school hours and as camps during holidays. Features of our Extracurricular Activities (ECAs): Qualified Instructors Structured, varied programmes onsite or off-site throughout the year Secure and safe environment Chess Our chess course provides a comprehensive and engaging learning experience for both beginners and intermediate players. Following a structured curriculum, students will build a strong foundation in the fundamentals of chess, including the rules, piece movements, and essential strategies. They will progress to exploring tactical combinations, positional play, and endgame techniques designed to strengthen overall gameplay. The course places strong emphasis on developing critical thinking, pattern recognition, and decision-making skills. Students will also learn how to create a personalized opening repertoire, prepare effectively for tournaments, and understand the psychological dimensions of the game. Provider: Think N’ Innovate Price Per Term: AED 1320 Section Specific: Primary For more information, please contact: Email: info@thinkninnovate.com Mobile: +971 55 536 2193 Fashion Designing Students will be introduced to the exciting world of fashion and will develop a strong foundation in fashion design, preparing them to potentially pursue a career in the field. They will learn essential skills such as pattern cutting, draping, sewing, and various textile techniques, along with gaining an understanding of fashion history to inspire and inform their creative process. By the end of the term, students will design and create their own wearable piece that they can proudly showcase and wear. Students will also explore different genres of photography, including motion, product, portrait, and stop-motion photography, while developing the skills to effectively balance the exposure triangle. Work With Us - Sunmarke School | British Curriculum | International School in Dubai Work With Us Contact Us > Work With Us Life at Sunmarke Sunmarke - Where Growth is a Way of Life Life at Sunmarke is an exciting journey in an organisation that believes in transforming children’s lives. Our teachers strongly believe in our education philosophy and play the role of nurturing adults who help spark imagination, build self-esteem in a child and help them discover their potential. At Sunmarke, you will join a large family of some of the best teaching talent in the region, handpicked for their inspirational teaching. You will be given the support, dedicated time, and world-class coaching and professional development to allow you to develop your skills and expertise to the highest levels, and keep abreast of the latest developments in teaching. As we grow our schools, you will be given multiple opportunities to take on more senior roles and further your career. You’ll love our warm and collaborative work environment, where transparency, camaraderie, and professional and personal growth are a way of life. Come, join us and make a difference in your life and people’s lives. View Our Current Vacancies It has come to our attention that fake job offers are been circulated on behalf of Sunmarke School by certain individuals/entities claiming they are representatives or subsidiaries or under contract with us. Sunmarke School does not: Request payment of any kind from prospective candidates for employment or any sort of fees in return for a job at Sunmarke School However, sometimes the recruitment process is done through professional recruiting agencies. In such cases, offers are always made directly by Sunmarke School and not by any third parties Sunmarke School will not be responsible for anyone acting on an employment offer not directly made by Sunmarke School. Our hiring & selection process involves interviews and assessments before any offer is made to a candidate. Sunmarke School’s Human Resources / Senior Leadership Team corresponds from email addresses with the domain “@fortesholdings.com” & / or “@forteseducation.com”. However, there is also a possibility of scammers to display the sent email domain address as “@fortesholdings.com” & / or “@forteseducation.com” fraudulently. Nevertheless, receiving emails will be possible only with the legitimate “@fortesholdings.com” & / or “@forteseducation.com” domain. In case any generic email ID ending with any other domain other than legitimate “@fortesholdings.com” & / or “@forteseducation.com” while receiving a job offer or interview call is being used, please be alert on the likelihood of this being a fake job offer. The Sunmarke School Human Resources team does not request or require personal documents like bank account details or credit card information as part of the recruitment process. Anyone making an employment offer in return for money or another type of gain is not authorised by Sunmarke School and is not offering an approved job. If you are in doubt or unsure about the source of the job offer, please visit the Career section on the Fortes Education / Fortes Investment / Sunmarke School website to verify the job offer or the application.If you believe you have been a victim of a recruitment fraud, you are requested to approach the law enforcement departments immediately.
